remarks: The ring base set of the constructed partial vector space A are all translation group endomorphisms (for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` ). (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvabase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvabase.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvabase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvabase.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvabase.c $e |- C = ( Base ` F ) $.
dvabase $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> C = E ) $.
